casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Mercutio STOKES, Defendant-Appellant. No. 08-10088

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. July 30, 2008. Roberta Josephina Bodnar, U.S. Attorney’s Office, Orlando, FL, for PlaintiffAppellee. Travis Williams, Esq., Orlando, FL, for Defendant-Appellant. Before BARKETT, MARCUS and WILSON, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM:

Travis Williams, appointed counsel for Mercutio Stokes, has filed a motion to withdraw on appeal supported by a brief prepared pursuant to Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967). Our independent review of the entire record reveals that coun: sel’s assessment of the relative merit of the appeal is correct. Because independent examination of the entire record reveals no issues of arguable merit, counsel’s motion to withdraw is GRANTED and-Stokes’s convictions and sentences are AFFIRMED.
